text: i don't want another parking space. i want my parking space. it's perfect. it's a corner spot, cutting the risk of door-dings in half. it's a mere 28 steps from the building entrance. the nearby tree provides shade on hot days and is also home to a delightful squirrel. which is fortuitous because most squirrels are real jerks.
